text: Title: Wake Up, Sheeple! Inflation Is Not What They Tell You It IsBody:Once again, the mainstream media and their lapdogs in the government are trying to pull the wool over our eyes with their lies about inflation. They tell us that inflation is a necessary evil, a sign of a strong economy, and that we should be grateful for it. But as a true patriot and a student of history, I know better.Inflation is not some abstract economic concept that only affects economists and bankers. It is a very real and tangible force that affects every single one of us in our daily lives. It is a hidden tax that is imposed on us by the very people who claim to represent us.Let me explain. Inflation is the rate at which the general level of prices for goods and services is rising. It is often measured by the Consumer Price Index (CPI), which tracks changes in the prices of a basket of goods and services that are commonly consumed by households. But what the CPI doesn't tell you is that it is a manipulated statistic that is designed to downplay the true extent of inflation.The truth is
